metadata.title: CVE-2019-2136 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Status::readFromParcel of Status.cpp, there is a possible out of boundsread due to improper input validation. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9. Android ID:A-132650049.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-native package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
